verbs.description: < p > Donald Trump [V: would] invite the North Korean dictator , Kim Jong - un , to the White House if next week ’s summit in Singapore is successful , the US president told reporters on Thursday.</p >

< p > [ARG0: Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: invite] [ARG1: the North Korean dictator , Kim Jong - un] , [ARG2: to the White House] [ARGM-ADV: if next week ’s summit in Singapore is successful] , the US president told reporters on Thursday.</p >

< p > Donald Trump would invite the North Korean dictator , Kim Jong - un , to the White House if [ARG1: next week ’s summit in Singapore] [V: is] [ARG2: successful] , the US president told reporters on Thursday.</p >

[ARG1: < p > Donald Trump would invite the North Korean dictator , Kim Jong - un , to the White House if next week ’s summit in Singapore is successful] , [ARG0: the US president] [V: told] [ARG2: reporters] [ARGM-TMP: on] Thursday.</p >
